greeting: ^Katia: What brings you home so early today?

emergency_intro: ^Hershel: We've run into a bit of trouble.

g-0: ^Katia: Oh no... how did they find out?
^Katia: I'm... not ready to leave yet.
^Katia: Hershel, can you pack up the remaining artifacts and depart early?
^Katia: I promise, I'll catch up soon. I know a safe way out.

depart_alone: ^Hershel: Alright. I'll hold you to it.
^Katia: Thank you... We'll meet up behind the inn, okay?
^Hershel: (... There's something I need to check on alone as well.)
depart_together: ^Hershel: No. Katia, we really don't have time-
^Katia: Hershel, please! We can't just leave all our documents behind!
^Hershel: If we're caught here, then everything we've done would be in vain!
^Katia: I understand. Lead the way, then.
end_sequence: ^System: Make your way to the destination marked on the map.
^System: You can view the full map by pressing M.
